transport.question: I have wheels and go 'Vroom Vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can take you to the park.
🚦 I stop at red lights.
⛽️ I need gas to go.

transport.question: I float on water and can take you across a lake. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I don't have wheels.
👨‍питан I need someone to steer me.
⚓️ I stop at the dock.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings.
✈️ I need a pilot to fly me.
💺 You sit inside me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry many people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I say 'Choo Choo!'
🛑 I stop at stations.
💺 I have lots of seats.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you push the pedals with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🔔 I have a bell to ring.
👦👧 You sit on a seat.
🚏 You use your legs to move me.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing lights.
🚌 I am long and rectangular.
🧑‍🏫 I drop you off at the front gate.

transport.question: I help people who are hurt very quickly, and I make a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a flashing light on top.
🤕 I take people to the hospital.
🚨 My siren goes 'wee-ooh, wee-ooh!'

transport.question: I carry lots of things and have a big open space at the back. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I am big and strong.
🧱 I deliver things to shops.
🚚 You load things at the back into a box.

transport.question: I use a propeller to fly, and land on top of buildings or hospitals. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I spin around and around.
➕ I often have a red cross.
🚨 I can take people somewhere fast from above.

transport.question: I zoom into space, way past the moon and stars. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🌌 I travel far into the galaxy.

bug.question: I have six legs and I love to crawl. I can be red or black, and I'm very small. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I like to march in a line.
🍕 I might try to steal a crumb of your lunch.
💪 I am a very hard worker.

bug.question: I flutter by with colorful wings. I like to drink sweet nectar from flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I start as a caterpillar.
🌈 I have beautiful patterns on my wings.
✈️ I fly around gardens.

bug.question: I buzz around flowers to collect pollen. I make honey in a hive. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow and black.
🍯 I can sting if I feel threatened.
🌼 I help flowers make seeds.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass, and I make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am usually green.
🎶 I make noise by rubbing my legs together.
🐸 Some animals like to eat me.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glow. I am a beetle, but I don't bite. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 You can see me blinking in the dark.
✨ I make my own light.
🌃 I am more common in the summer.

bug.question: I have many legs and a long, wiggly body. I live in the dirt and help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I can be found in the garden.
🪱 Birds like to eat me.
🌍 I help to mix up the soil.

bug.question: I have eight legs and I spin a web. Some people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I catch bugs in my trap.
🕷️ I am not an insect.
🏠 Some people think I'm creepy.

bug.question: I love to bite you and drink your blood. I fly around and make a buzzing sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be very annoying at night.
💉 Only female ones bite.
💦 I like to live near water.

bug.question: I am a red bug with black spots. Farmers love to see me in their gardens. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle.
🪴 I eat aphids, which hurt plants.
🍀 Some people think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I make a sticky silk home that can hurt your clothes. I eat fabric but I am not hungry for food. What am I?

hints.text: 👚 I might be in your closet.
🐛 I hatch from an egg.
🚪 You might find me in dark spaces.
